programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers - New Tricks
programme.desc: Nigel transforms favorite classic recipes by giving them a new twist.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers - Making Things Go Further
programme.desc: Nigel Slater uses pantry and garden finds to create a week of meals and shows how to stretch ingredients.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers - Spice Up Your Life
programme.desc: Nigel Slater shows that spicy food isn't just hot chilies, using everyday spices for a week's tasty meals.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers - Too Good to Waste
programme.desc: Nigel Slater transforms stale bread, brown bananas and hard cheese to make meals that are truly delicious.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers - Unsung Heroes
programme.desc: Nigel Slater creates a week's worth of simple but delicious meals from ingredients that are often overlooked.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers - Saints and Sinners
programme.desc: Nigel Slater creates a week's worth of simple but delicious meals from ingredients that are often overlooked.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers - Sense of Adventure
programme.desc: Nigel proves that adventurous doesn't have to mean complicated.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Suppers - Planning Ahead
programme.desc: Nigel shows how, with a little forward planning, all the stress can be taken out of cooking.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking - Sweet and Sour
programme.desc: Nigel explores one of the oldest, most successful culinary pairings in the kitchen.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking - Fish and Meat
programme.desc: The spotlight is on the classic culinary pairing of fish and meat.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking - Spicy and Cool
programme.desc: Why do spicy flavors work so well with something cooling? Nigel shares some of his favorite dishes.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking - Soft and Crisp
programme.desc: Success in the kitchen is not just about tastes and flavors; contrasting textures can lift a dish.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking - Sugar and Spice
programme.desc: Nigel unravels the magic behind this combination, revealing why this exotic marriage works so well.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking - Born and Bred
programme.desc: Nigel shows us how to transform everyday suppers.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking - Hot and Cold
programme.desc: Nigel looks at the role of contrasting temperatures.

programme.title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking
programme.sub-title: Nigel Slater's Simple Cooking - Weird and Wonderful
programme.desc: Discover why the most unlikely combinations can be the best, as Nigel explores unusual ingredients.
